title: Bloomberg's Larson: Why Tech Companies Get Sued in China(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Larson: Why Tech Companies Get Sued in China(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Matt Larson, Litigation Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on why tech companies are getting sued in China.
